summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the purchase of easements across certain properties required in connection with the construction of Sewer Improvement Program Project 13, neighborhood Improvement Program Contract 7 (South McClellan Street); providing also for the acquisition of rights of entry to make sewer reconnections in certain designated areas and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund for the cost of such purchases and acquisitions, including the expenses of the Engineering Department.
